/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on requests from VA to OWCP, including
prohibition on concurrent payment of compensation by OWCP and VA
where to obtain information on OWCP compensation
, and
handling concurrent entitlement to OWCP and VA disability compensation
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Information Requests to Other Federal Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
